casebody.data:
Harry V. CHASAN, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. CARUSO SPAGHETTI PLACE, INC., of NEW JERSEY, Defendant-Appellee. No. 373. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit May 22, 1944. S. Joseph Oxenberg, of New York City, for appellant. Sullivan, Donovan & Heénehan, of New York City, for appellee.

Before SWAN, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CLARK, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order, 55 F.Supp. 831, affirmed.
